meanings.definition: Excessively forward or confident; taking liberties.
meanings.sent1: Her presumptuousness behavior made others uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: It was presumptuousness of him to assume he would be chosen without qualifications.
meanings.sent3: His presumptuousness in thinking he could beat a professional chess player was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The cat's presumptuousness in stealing the dog's bed was quite bold.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's presumptuousness in assigning homework over the weekend was unexpected.

meanings.definition: Bold or arrogant in a way that is offensive.
meanings.sent1: I was taken aback by her presumptuousness comment.
meanings.sent2: His presumptuousness attitude rubbed many people the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's presumptuousness in stealing the bird's food was quite bold.
meanings.sent4: The storm's presumptuousness in disrupting the picnic was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The politician's presumptuousness in promising the impossible was laughable.
